text: She had her truth. How much had built up from that first ideal, and how little joy, or satisfaction, it had given her. 'Im sorry, darling: He looked nervous. It had been hell lying there, knowing she was talking to Nicholas and wondering what were saying. Sandra said instinctively: 'I told him I knew he was responsible for Beryl's death.
